> Use IFS to share the data!

And it may be a good idea to create multiple hubs for different speciality/category

If someone want to do that, I can write a multi-uploading script for it

1519411240_18A7MxMQS5WnxRnQR6CtytEzjZ4Us.body: Also there is [Zerogreeter](/presto.greeter.bit), a ZeroHello alternative written in vue.js and created by [Sorasumi](/sorasumi.bit/). The source code is inside the zite itself, or available in Git Center.

1519558791_12HSLurcaibJh4A44LGHoXm6cv6jA.body: Check this ZeroTalk topic: [Zeronet with I2P Support + dropdown menus and yes you hear right](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1516151246_1Mr2r33XUTykaCR9yXLhqdkx2DaNa9EALD), you can search i2p on ZeroHello for more discussion

1523133465_195oGGXB8AhwWSoXFHpbVT4TL4wLi.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_217_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Users should be able to filter out posts by language - same as on ZeroSites, there is already the pull request for that i think. It is waiting to be completed/merged by the @nofish or @stbinan or @anyone i assume.

Thanks for mentioning the PR, I'm stbinan on Github. It's complete and at least I'm using it by [ZeroMe Mobile](/1G9wPKCvqdzZVRzZizcsExhYufMpAxbh6U/), you can clone it or compile one from source code for yourself, too. 

The code is a bit too much and nofish probably prefers to keep ZeroMe as simple as possible, a little inconvenient for newcomer though.. Using translation machine for understanding other languages is also recommended.

1524573807_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5.body: Everyone is all seeding User Registry Hub, you can find new users and new hubs there, but it's not implemented in the UI, I recently wrote [an article about ZeroMe stats](/1EiMAqhd6sMjPG2tznkkGXxhdwFBDdeqT9/?Post:81), if you are interested.
